Cold Oath Collective
Field Brief Circles Witness

Nonprofit Research and Public Education

Ice deserves respect for staying solid under pressure.

We document the social, ecological, and emotional value of committed water. From neighborhood coolers to mountain corridors, our investigators gather testimony, publish practical guidance, and fund local awareness nights where winter ethics are discussed without spectacle.

Current campaign: Operation Glass Hour. We are placing printed street placards in twelve coastal districts reminding residents that every cube is a temporary monument.

Registered 501(c)(3) educational foundation.
Community office: Port Meridian, Gulf Ward. Intake line: +1 (555) 013-0481
Night dispatch: dispatch@coldoath.org
